title: 26 and feel like I can't do anything right

thread.content: I have my days where everything is fine I'm loved I love my fiancee' and my daughter. Then there are days where nothing is right I can't do anything right I screw up all the time and its my fault so what do i do about it? I cry alone for a very long time I'm a stay at home mom raising my one year old while fiancee works I have some friends but I feel like none of them want to hang out with me or maybe I don't put myself out there enough I don't know I stay at home most of the time maybe I'm just complaining I just need someone to talk to
thread.author: kayville09

thread.content: Every Day Sunny days Stormy days God is there every day Happy days Sad days God is there every day Good days Bad days God is there every day At day At night God is there every day Today or the next day God will be there every day This is by von.
thread.author: samm00
